Europe, in this new world that is coming up, if it wants to become a key actor and stay a key actor it has to express itself in terms of its unity and it has to make sure that euro is also secured by a much greater common effort, working together in fiscal monetary and general economic policies. Got Talent star is throwing the party at her? 300,000 gated home in Blackburn tomorrow, according to The Sun. The paper claims that the singer has invited both Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell to the event. We've heard Simon Cowell and Piers Morgan have been invited, a source said.`` Susan Boyle 's very keen to see Piers Morgan again.'' However, with Piers Morgan currently filming for his new CNN show in America it seems unlikely that he will be in attendance.

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . And Aaron Rodgers is getting even more MVP treatment tonight, where you can catch him on The Late Show with David Letterman . The show starts at 10:35 p.m. tonight, right after Channel
